Now let me add JavaScript to show the floating CTA after scrolling:

---

<details><summary>Edit file: meetly/index.html</summary>

undefined

**Chunk 1**
Lines added: 18, lines removed: undefined

```diff
@@ -778,4 +778,22 @@
                   // Initialize workflow after page load
          document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', setupWorkflow);
+ 
+         // Floating CTA visibility
+         function handleFloatingCTA() {
+             const floatingCTA = document.getElementById('floating-cta');
+             const scrollPosition = window.scrollY;
+             const windowHeight = window.innerHeight;
+             
+             if (scrollPosition > windowHeight * 0.5) {
+                 floatingCTA.style.opacity = '1';
+                 floatingCTA.style.transform = 'translateY(0)';
+             } else {
+                 floatingCTA.style.opacity = '0';
+                 floatingCTA.style.transform = 'translateY(16px)';
+             }
+         }
+         
+         window.addEventListener('scroll', handleFloatingCTA);
+         document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', handleFloatingCTA);
      </script>
  </body>
```

</details>
